translations.translation: How terrible were My punishment and warnings!
How was then My punishment and My commination!
So how awesome were My chastisement and My warnings!
How terrible was Our torment and the result of (their disregard) of Our warning.
So how did My punishment turn out, and My warnings?
Then, how was My torment and My warnings
How (great) was then My punishment and My warning!
How then were My chastisement and My warnings?
Then see how (dreadful) was My punishment after My warnings!
How [dreadful] was My punishment and My warning!
So how dreodful have been My torment and My warning.
So how were My punishment and warnings?!
Yea, how (terrible) was My Penalty and My Warning!
Then, how (terrible) was My Torment and My Warnings?
How then were My punishment and My warnings!
So how were My punishment and My warnings?
And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
[54:21] How then were My chastisement and My warnings?
Then see how (dreadful) was My punishment after My warnings!) See, Muhammad, how was My punishment of them, and how was the state of those who were warned by Hud but did not believe him.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي } إياهم { وَنُذُرِ } [القمر: 21] أي: بمن بعدهم
